title: [Tests only] Refactor PropertiesUsageAnalyzerTest
body:
### Context
Improves the `PrepareSampleProjectsAndConfig` so that it can be used by tests using different assets. And then used the helper for `PropertiesUsageAnalyzerTest`

### Changes Made
 * Refactored `PrepareSampleProjectsAndConfig` to accept `projectFile` and `supplementalAssetNames` as parameters.
 * Refactored calling tests
 * Extracted the asset file from `PropertiesUsageAnalyzerTest`
 * Renamed the asset files so that their naming is in line with the naming during testing

### Testing
Those are the actual tests
